compliance_units.subject: developer
constraint: must not represents and warrants it designed and owns the proprietary software known as 'BioTrack'
compliance_units.context: ownership and background of the licensed software

compliance_units.subject: client
constraint: is granted a license to use 'BioTrack' solely to manage its warehouse operations
compliance_units.context: license purpose limitation for the client

compliance_units.subject: client
constraint: must not claim ownership of 'BioTrack' or any derivative works
must not remove or obscure proprietary notices on 'BioTrack'

compliance_units.subject: client
constraint: must keep the developer's confidential information confidential in accordance with the Non-Disclosure Agreement dated January 14, 2023
compliance_units.context: continuing confidentiality obligations under the prior NDA

compliance_units.subject: client
constraint: may use 'BioTrack' only within the North American region

compliance_units.subject: parties
constraint: agree to formalize and govern their commercial relationship under the terms of this Master Services Agreement
compliance_units.context: agreement framework and intent to be bound
